thread.title: Oakley watches Knicks-Cavs game with Dan Gilbert

title: Oakley watches Knicks-Cavs game with Dan Gilbert
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Oakley watches Knicks-Cavs game with Dan Gilbert Charles Oakley was next to ... Dan Gilbert. Post to Facebook Oakley watches Knicks-Cavs game with Dan Gilbert Charles Oakley was next to ... Dan Gilbert. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/charles-oakley-knicks-cavaliers-game-dan-gilbert/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address.   Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Oakley watches Knicks-Cavs game with Dan Gilbert Andrew Joseph 9:22 p.m. ET Feb. 23, 2017 
Cleveland Cavaliers owner Dan Gilbert sits next to former NBA player Charles Oakley prior to the game between the Cleveland Cavaliers and the New York Knicks at Quicken Loans Arena on February 15, 2017 in Cleveland, Ohio. (Photo: Getty Images) 
Despite the best efforts from Adam Silver and Michael Jordan , former Knicks star Charles Oakley isn't ready to return to Madison Square Garden after his arrest and subsequent feud with Knicks owner James Dolan. 
That didn't mean he stopped attending Knicks games, though. 
Oakley was in Cleveland on Thursday for the Cavaliers' nationally televised game against the Knicks. He was sitting next to Cavaliers owner Dan Gilbert. Charles Oakley sitting with Cavalier owner Dan Gilbert. pic.twitter.com/UDgcHwF27R 
According Cleveland.com , Oakley was the guest of LeBron James' attorney Frederick Nantz, and Gilbert later invited him to sit courtside for the game. Charles Oakley is sitting next to Cavs owner Dan Gilbert for the Knicks-Cavs game. â€” NBA on ESPN (@ESPNNBA) February 24, 2017 
It was a stark contrast from what happened with Oakley at the Garden. Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/charles-oakley-knicks-cavaliers-game-dan-gilbert/ Most Popular
